TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Articles.Content: Does my error message mean you are trying to allocate 32bit memory on a 64bit ksp? I run the 64bit Linux version.

Im having trouble installing this mod, I'm trying to intall version 0.021. But when the download finishes it shows me a config file, a bunch of SHADER files, and the .dll. I tried several approaches to installing but all have lead to nothing looking different, if anyone can help me out that would be great.

> 
> 
> 6 minutes ago, Noname115 said:
> 
> 
> Im having trouble installing this mod, I'm trying to intall version 0.021. But when the download finishes it shows me a config file, a bunch of SHADER files, and the .dll. I tried several approaches to installing but all have lead to nothing looking different, if anyone can help me out that would be great.
> 

Drop the contents of the GameData folder into your Scatterer folder.
Blackrack you sexy sonovabitch. I love you man.

> 
> 
> 8 minutes ago, Noname115 said:
> 
> 
> Im having trouble installing this mod, I'm trying to intall version 0.021. But when the download finishes it shows me a config file, a bunch of SHADER files, and the .dll. I tried several approaches to installing but all have lead to nothing looking different, if anyone can help me out that would be great.
> 

put all of those shader files and the dll and the config folder in one folder in GameData named scatterer. so the file address should read: 

    ~\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\scatterer\config

also, rename the "Config" folder to "config" (case sensitive).

> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, cobbman11 said:
> 
> 
> Drop the contents of the GameData folder into your Scatterer folder.
> 

Yeah, I looked into a old version of the mod and it seems that he forgot to enter the "scatterer" folder before the contents. While that solves that issue, I have more. I'm not sure why but the scatterer effects don't show up in the map view or on the main menu like it used to, is this a problem with 1.0.5 or scatterer?

I need a fresh pair of pants.

Also, when I say "map view", I meant to say the Tracking station, while in-flight the scatterer effects do show up, but for neither the Tracking station or main menu.

I'm getting an issue where in cockpit/IVA the ocean vanishes if I roll past 90\* or go upside-down, I removed EVE and SkyTonemapper so it's pretty much just part mods left. Is anyone else getting this or will I be making a new install? Looks incredible by the way ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Edit: I use the right file directory too

Okay, one more. Edited, of course ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ":wink:")![RU7zHPG.png](http://i.imgur.com/RU7zHPG.png)

> 
> 39 minutes ago, Jeorge said:
> 
> 
> I don't use the command 64 option to leave everything out as default, I haven't tried the opengl optimization, how do i do that? Is it required for this mod?
> 

So in your steam Ksp launch options you need to put

%command%\_64 \_GL\_THREADED\_OPTIMIZATIONS=1

This used all my memory so you had best use the 64bit switch
